methods.description: Return a collection of mortgages by created date from a specific date

parameters.name: shortName
parameters.description: The unique client short-name

parameters.name: branchId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Branch

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The date to search from.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first item to return

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return (up to 1000 per request)

responses.description: Results model to store receivership case results.
